FuncDef:
The ptp clock-source atr enable command enables 1588 ATR time source synchronization.
The undo ptp clock-source atr enable command disables 1588 ATR time source synchronization.
By default, 1588 ATR time source synchronization is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable 1588 ATR time source synchronization, run this command.
This command applies only to 1588 ATR.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
